page.title: 15WIX SERVICE STN.MICHAELA R.
page.content: MR.BRISCOE OWNS WIX SERVICE STATION. HE EMPLOYS 2 MEN FROM WRABNESS WHO WORK IN THE GARAGE.THE SERVICE STATION SELLS ABOUT 12,000 GALLONS OF PETROL AND 600 GALLONS OF DIESEL LORRY FUEL A WEEK ON AVERAGE.THE GARAGE REPAIRS CARS AND ALSO DOES BETWEEN 25 AND 30 M.O.T. TESTS EACH WEEK.THE OPENING OF WIX BY-PASS AFFECTED BUSINESS BADLY AT THE GARAGE ESPECIALLY THE PETROL SALES.MR.BRISCOE BUYS HIS PETROL FROM BURMAH OIL AND CAN STORE 5,000 GALLONS IN 4 UNDERGROUND TANKS.HE ALSO SELLS OIL,SPARE CAR PARTS,TYRES,SWEETS AND CIGARETTES.MOST OF MR.BRISCOES CUSTOMERS COME FROM DOVERCOURT,GT. OAKLEY AND WIX.THE GARAGE HAS 2 HOISTS FOR LIFTING UP CARS,AN INSPECTION PIT,A BRAKE-TESTING MACHINE AND AN ENGINE TUNING MACHINE.
